title: (x) Candice CD tracklisting - Raphael {David H}
content:
New to the board - can anyone help with the typeface used on the CD for a singer called Candice   
Many Thanks   
   
Scott ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20050518052540im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/42618.jpg)
author: scotchio

comments.content:
Should be ' [Raphael](http://web.archive.org/web/20050518052540/http:/store.adobe.com/type/browser/F/RAPQ/F_RAPQ-10005000.jhtml)', from Adobe / Agfa / Monotype.. With slightly 'improved' kerning.. ![:-)](http://web.archive.org/web/20050518052540im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/clipart/happy.gif)   
 [www.myfonts.com/fonts/agfa/raphael/raphael/testdrive.html?s=No Ordinary Girl&p=60](http://web.archive.org/web/20050518052540/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/agfa/raphael/raphael/testdrive.html?s=No%20Ordinary%20Girl&p=60)
